response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will meet all your expectations. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at an exclusive price of $995,000. This special offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing me to maintain a competitive edge in the market.
